text: Lagerstroemia intermedia is a species of plant in the family Lythraceae. It is found in China and Thailand. It is threatened by habitat loss. As of 2010, it was classified as "Vulnerable" on the International Union for Conservation of Nature's Red List. ==References== intermedia Category:Flora of China Category:Flora of Thailand Category:Trees of China Category:Trees of Thailand Category:Vulnerable flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lagerstroemia intermedia
